https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6XbqSWGM7qVLwAEDNez8ZurlQ0F.jpg The plot is vaguely reminiscent of The Devil Wears Prada. The heroine is a new fashion editor who has to deal with her female boss and boyfriend, an arrogant young painter who has a chaotic past with other girls. Color Me Love
